title: Freelance - Short Film
description:
💬 DESCRIPTION:  A young hopeful Knight reports for duty at the King's court. Little does he know that slaying dragons might not be his biggest challenge.

https://www.freelance-film.com

This film was made possible with the support of SideFX Houdini.

🔴 No dragons where hurt during the making of this film. 🐲

Like 👍 & Subscribe 🔔 for more FREE ANIMATION resources, courses, news, reviews and funny moments: https://www.youtube.com/theadventuresoflollypopman?sub_confirmation=1
